fields.title: Harris 1980 ABC Election Survey, study no. 802120

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
ABC election survey no. 13 asks voters their preferences in Congressional races and among presidential candidates John Anderson, Ronald Reagan and Jimmy Carter.

Questions also cover the televised debate by the League of Women Voters between Anderson and Reagan.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Harris obtained a cross-section sample of likely voters. Attitudes on various topics were collected by questionnaire in a telephone interview; U.S. adults, likely voters; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-802120;

distributor.distributorName: Louis Harris Data Center, University of North Carolina
